channel.title: PloxScape - 24/7 - NON-DONATING SERVER - Server In Progress - STAFF NEEDED!
channel.description:
[center][b]IMPORTANT:[/b] I just wanted to point out one thing about this server that may grab your attention: YOU DO NOT HAVE TO DONATE! THERE IS NO DONATING! EVERYONE IS EQUAL! [/center]
[center][b]REMINDER:[/b] Be sure you register on the forums for your chance to become a [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/images/misc/newbieguide_crown_silver.gif[/img][b]Player Moderator[/b]!
Visit the PloxScape Forums here: [url=http://www.PloxScape.boards.net/]http://www.PloxScape.boards.net/[/url][/center]
[center]
[color=red][b]ATTENTION:[/b][/color] [color=red]Please read all of the following. This is my first server and I just now attempted making one and somehow got lucky with the process over night. It would mean the absolute world to me to have some players on my server to help me further develop my amateur skills as a coder into something more. Alone, I know I can't do this by myself. But together, with the right people? We could take this server far. I know it. I dream big, I learn FAST, and I'm highly motivated. All I need is a chance. And that's where [b]YOU[/b] come in!
[b]NOTICE:[/b] Download links are at the bottom of the page!
Also, yes, I [b]AM[/b] looking for staff right now!
[b]Current work in progress:[/b] In-game or forum-based highscores![/color]
[color=black]Greetings everyone![/color]
[color=black]My name is Brandon, AKA [img]http://i684.photobucket.com/albums/vv210/kickman46/bth_admin-1.png[/img][b]Mod Plox[/b], and I'm the creator of PloxScape, waiting for my next partner to come along!
Before you click out of this server because you believe it is "too much to read" or "isn't straight enough to the point", let me tell you something. I have never coded a server before. I have never created a RuneScape private server before, until now. I don't believe in half-assed descriptions about servers. If you're going to work so hard on something, why half-ass it at the very end? If you're still reading, thanks for sticking around, and I'm glad I have your attention. ;)
I started out with a blank client, and a blank source. Researching how to port-forward, code in items in shops, etc. is what I've been doing for the past 15 hours. I've been awake all night, but I finally got everything running smoothly! Everything you see in this server was mostly already there. I changed the sprites around a bit, and I'm trying to figure out how to incorporate items such as Dragon boots, Skillcapes, Godswords, and a bunch of other items that are further ahead of this client and source's time into the game, but I am really lost.[/color]
[color=black]I don't even know how to get the stupid purple text above my head whenever I talk to go away. This is why I need a partner! Somebody who can teach me, and receive full ownership in the production of this server's true potential along with myself.[/color]
[color=black][b]Here are some pictures:[/b][/color]
[color=black][b]Here's the client layout! I would like to make this look better! I managed to come up with this, but I'm open to suggestions, though I kind of like the simplicity, if you know what I mean![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/ClientInterface.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/ClientInterface.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Welcome, one and all![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/WelcomeToPloxScape.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/WelcomeToPloxScape.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working NPC shops! I just can't figure out how to get them to talk. Again, I'm an amateur, looking for some knowledge![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/NPCShops.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/NPCShops.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Niles. He isn't apart of the shop conga-line you saw before me in the last photo, but I would like to put him there! Also not sure how to do this![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/NilesArmorShop.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/NilesArmorShop.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working 1v1 Edgeville PKing![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/1v1EdgePk.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/1v1EdgePk.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Beginner's Training area![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/BeginTraining.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/BeginTraining.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working Ancient magicks & altar![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/AncientMagickTele.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/AncientMagickTele.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Druids, Gargoyles & more in the "Cave" training teleport![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/CaveTraining.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/CaveTraining.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Ghetto/Old-style Godwars![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/GhettoGodwars.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/GhettoGodwars.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Annnnnd... Everyone's familiar with these things, haha![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/RockCrabs.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/RockCrabs.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Slayer Tower![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/SlayerTower.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/SlayerTower.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Old-school island training teleport with Elf warriors, Hill giants, and Moss giants![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/IslandTele.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/IslandTele.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working Fight pits teleport![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/FightPits.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/FightPits.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working Pest Control WITH Void Knight rewards![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/PestControl.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/PestControl.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Where the portals take you:[/b][/color] [color=red]([b]NOTICE:[/b] See how I typed "Godwarse" & "Dragonse"? It did that because I tried back-slashing between the two words... Why? I'd love to be able to know how to fix this chat-box text issue.. Thank you!)[/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/Portals.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/Portals.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]The Dagganoth Lair! With bosses! :D[/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/DagLair.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/DagLair.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Fully working PKing teleports![/b][/color] [color=red][b]NOTICE:[/b][/color] [color=red]Varrock PKing is MULTI.[/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/FullPKTeleports.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/FullPKTeleports.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Old-school server styled Barrows! I'd love to learn how to code Barrows![/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/Barrows.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/Barrows.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black][b]Umm... Yeah. ._.[/b][/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/ApeAtoll.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/ApeAtoll.png[/img][/URL]
[color=red]Thank you very much for sticking around this far! Whoever you are, reading this right now? I really, really appreciate you![/color]
[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/PleaseBeApartOfIt.png.html][IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l333/Brandon-FS/SNAZZAY/PleaseBeApartOfIt.png[/img][/URL]
[color=black]I believe this server could go somewhere with the right people operating it. Thank you for sticking around, again![/color]
[color=red][b]NOTE:[/b] You need [b]WinRAR[/b] to download and play this server![/color]
[size=18pt][color=red][b]Download this client to play on the server:[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/a5xgs6deotf6kyg/PloxScape.rar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/a5xgs6deotf6kyg/PloxScape.rar[/url]
[color=black]Please visit the [b]PloxScape Forums[/b] to find a detailed tutorial on how to [b]download[/b] and [b]play[/b] PloxScape![/color]
[url=http://www.PloxScape.boards.net/]http://www.PloxScape.boards.net/[/url]
[color=black]Thank you so much for your time! I hope to see you in-game [color=black]REAL[/color] soon! :)
Yours sincerely,[/color]
[img]http://i684.photobucket.com/albums/vv210/kickman46/bth_admin-1.png[/img][b][color=black]Mod Plox[/color][/b][/center]

item.title: PloxScape - 24/7 - NON-DONATING SERVER - Server In Progress - STAFF NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @PloxScape PloxScape
item.description:
@PloxScape wrote:

[center]IMPORTANT:
I just wanted to point out one thing about this server that may grab your attention: YOU DO NOT HAVE TO DONATE! THERE IS NO DONATING! EVERYONE IS EQUAL!
[/center]

[center]REMINDER:
Be sure you register on the forums for your chance to become a Player Moderator!

Visit the PloxScape Forums here: http://www.PloxScape.boards.net/[/center]

[center]

[color=red]ATTENTION:[/color]
[color=red]Please read all of the following. This is my first server and I just now attempted making one and somehow got lucky with the process over night. It would mean the absolute world to me to have some players on my server to help me further develop my amateur skills as a coder into something more. Alone, I know I can’t do this by myself. But together, with the right people? We could take this server far. I know it. I dream big, I learn FAST, and I’m highly motivated. All I need is a chance. And that’s where YOU come in!

NOTICE:
Download links are at the bottom of the page!

Also, yes, I AM looking for staff right now!

Current work in progress:
In-game or forum-based highscores![/color]

[color=black]Greetings everyone![/color]

[color=black]My name is Brandon, AKA Mod Plox, and I’m the creator of PloxScape, waiting for my next partner to come along!

Before you click out of this server because you believe it is “too much to read” or “isn’t straight enough to the point”, let me tell you something. I have never coded a server before. I have never created a RuneScape private server before, until now. I don’t believe in half-assed descriptions about servers. If you’re going to work so hard on something, why half-ass it at the very end? If you’re still reading, thanks for sticking around, and I’m glad I have your attention.

I started out with a blank client, and a blank source. Researching how to port-forward, code in items in shops, etc. is what I’ve been doing for the past 15 hours. I’ve been awake all night, but I finally got everything running smoothly! Everything you see in this server was mostly already there. I changed the sprites around a bit, and I’m trying to figure out how to incorporate items such as Dragon boots, Skillcapes, Godswords, and a bunch of other items that are further ahead of this client and source’s time into the game, but I am really lost.[/color]

[color=black]I don’t even know how to get the stupid purple text above my head whenever I talk to go away. This is why I need a partner! Somebody who can teach me, and receive full ownership in the production of this server’s true potential along with myself.[/color]

[color=black]Here are some pictures:[/color]

[color=black]Here’s the client layout! I would like to make this look better! I managed to come up with this, but I’m open to suggestions, though I kind of like the simplicity, if you know what I mean![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/ClientInterface.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Welcome, one and all![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/WelcomeToPloxScape.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working NPC shops! I just can’t figure out how to get them to talk. Again, I’m an amateur, looking for some knowledge![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/NPCShops.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Niles. He isn’t apart of the shop conga-line you saw before me in the last photo, but I would like to put him there! Also not sure how to do this![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/NilesArmorShop.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working 1v1 Edgeville PKing![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/1v1EdgePk.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Beginner’s Training area![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/BeginTraining.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working Ancient magicks & altar![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/AncientMagickTele.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Druids, Gargoyles & more in the “Cave” training teleport![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/CaveTraining.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Ghetto/Old-style Godwars![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/GhettoGodwars.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Annnnnd… Everyone’s familiar with these things, haha![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/RockCrabs.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Slayer Tower![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/SlayerTower.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Old-school island training teleport with Elf warriors, Hill giants, and Moss giants![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/IslandTele.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working Fight pits teleport![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/FightPits.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working Pest Control WITH Void Knight rewards![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/PestControl.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Where the portals take you:[/color] [color=red](NOTICE: See how I typed “Godwarse” & “Dragonse”? It did that because I tried back-slashing between the two words… Why? I’d love to be able to know how to fix this chat-box text issue… Thank you!)[/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/Portals.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]The Dagganoth Lair! With bosses! [/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/DagLair.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Fully working PKing teleports![/color] [color=red]NOTICE:[/color] [color=red]Varrock PKing is MULTI.[/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/FullPKTeleports.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Old-school server styled Barrows! I’d love to learn how to code Barrows![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/Barrows.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]Umm… Yeah. ._.[/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/ApeAtoll.png.html][/URL]

[color=red]Thank you very much for sticking around this far! Whoever you are, reading this right now? I really, really appreciate you![/color]

[URL=http://s328.photobucket.com/user/Brandon-FS/media/SNAZZAY/PleaseBeApartOfIt.png.html][/URL]

[color=black]I believe this server could go somewhere with the right people operating it. Thank you for sticking around, again![/color]
